name: Spaze Battle
overview: Spaze Battle is a 1-player side scrolling arcade game for the VIC-20 released in the July\August 1984 issue of VICTAPE Computing issue #5. . In the sequel to White Line Warrior, the evil forces of the Imperial Fleet are on their way to Earth with the avowed intent of subduing its people into slavery. You must ride your Spaze Chariot against the Imperial Fleet once again. The player controls a small ship that rapidly flies towards the right through a tunnel, and can move up and down. The player encounters Axel Fighters, and every 5th ship is a Mother Ship. The Axel fighters must be avoided, but the Mother Ships can be rammed for points. The player loses a life if they hit a wall or an Axel Fighter. Release in the August 1984 of VICTAPE Computing magazine (a UK based "emag" on cassette).
